The pure class interface. 
public class FormatGroup
  extends FormatBeside
This is a specialization of the class FormatBeside for a list of Formats that should be grouped in a way that the first item is printed 'beside' the 2nd item and the last item is printed 'beside' the one before that.

This behaviour is especially useful for bracketed constructions.

Here an example: 
   ________________.....
  |___|            |   :
  :   |            |___:
  :...|____________|___|

Author:
Jacob Wieland (ughosage@cs.tu-berlin.de)
See also:
